Title: Fratelli e sorelle
Actors: Franco Nero, Paola Quattrini, Anna Bonaiuto, Lino Capolicchio
Plot: After twenty years of marriage, Gloria discovers that her husband has been cheating on her. It' a terrible trauma and she decides to stay with her sister in USA in St. Louis. She takes with her Matteo and Francesco, her two sons. Matteo wastes no time in settling into his new life, but Francesco find it more difficult, being shy and full of complexes.
